wikipedia_page.main: Norman Rimmington  (29 November 1923 – 29 December 2016) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Barnsley and Hartlepool United.

response: *Norman Rimmington, 93, English footballer (Hartlepool, Barnsley), kidney failure.
* 29 December 2016: Norman Rimmington, 93, Barnsley and Hartlepool United, goalkeeper, Matt Carragher, 40, Wigan Athletic, Port Vale and Macclesfield Town defender.
*Norman Rimmington. For services to football and the community of Barnsley.
